data.fullContent: The cell phone has been around for fewer than 40 years, but it has changed so much since its invention in the 1980s. For some people, a cell phone is an extension of their personality, as a result of how much they use it in their daily lives. Today, people can use cell phones for entertainment by taking pictures, recording videos, sending text messages, listening to music, and playing games. Cell phones can also have functional purposes, making tasks quicker and easier to complete. For example, cell phones can be used to pay bills, buy items online, and organize events in an electronic calendar. The technology of cell phones has evolved greatly in the past two decades, allowing people to use their phones for both functional and entertainment purposes.

q1.translation: 手机问世不到40年，但自20世纪80年代发明以来，它已经发生了很大的变化。对于一些人来说，手机是他们个性的延伸，因为他们在日常生活中经常使用它。今天，人们可以用手机来拍照、录视频、发短信、听音乐和玩游戏。
q1.front: The cell phone has been around for fewer than 40 years, but it has changed so much since its invention in the 1980s. For some people, a cell phone is an extension of their personality, as a result of how much they use it in their daily lives. Today, people can use cell phones for entertainment by taking pictures, recording videos, sending text messages, listening to music, and playing games.
q1.content: The cell phone has been around for fewer than 40 ____, but it has changed so much since its invention in the 1980s. For some people, a cell phone is an extension of their personality, as a result of how ____ they use it in their daily ____. Today, people can ____ cell phones for entertainment by ____ pictures, recording videos, sending ____ messages, listening ____ music, and ____ games.

q2.translation: 手机问世不到40年，但自20世纪80年代发明以来，它已经发生了很大的变化。对于一些人来说，手机是他们个性的延伸，因为他们在日常生活中经常使用它。今天，人们可以用手机来拍照、录视频、发短信、听音乐和玩游戏。手机也有功能性用途，使任务更快更容易完成。例如，手机可以用来支付账单，在线购物，并在电子日历中组织活动。在过去的二十年里，手机技术有了很大的发展，使得人们可以将手机用于功能性和娱乐目的。
q2.front: The cell phone has been around for fewer than 40 years, but it has changed so much since its invention in the 1980s. For some people, a cell phone is an extension of their personality, as a result of how much they use it in their daily lives. Today, people can use cell phones for entertainment by taking pictures, recording videos, sending text messages, listening to music, and playing games.
q2.middle: Cell phones can also have functional purposes, making tasks quicker and easier to complete.
q2.ending: For example, cell phones can be used to pay bills, buy items online, and organize events in an electronic calendar. The technology of cell phones has evolved greatly in the past two decades, allowing people to use their phones for both functional and entertainment purposes.

options.sentence: It is common that people with cell phones use them first thing in the morning after waking up.
Cell phones can also have functional purposes, making tasks quicker and easier to complete.
Cell phones are used every day by millions of people around the world.
Advertising and marketing experts made sure that they targeted their ads to the appropriate audience with the right message.

options.sentence: Laptop computers are a great way to stay in touch with family and friends, but they can be a distraction.
Cell phone users should always use caution when using their devices near construction zones, schools, and places where children could be playing.
Cell phones should not be used while driving, unless the car is equipped with technology that allows the user to talk without holding the device.
People can use cell phones to pay bills, bank online, organize events, and communicate with others.
